event.description: Charlie Blackmon strikes out swinging.
DJ LeMahieu grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Jesus Aguilar.
Carlos Gonzalez doubles (1) on a line drive to third baseman Travis Shaw.
Nolan Arenado walks.
Trevor Story singles on a soft ground ball to first baseman Jesus Aguilar. Carlos Gonzalez to 3rd. Nolan Arenado to 2nd.
Gerardo Parra grounds out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to first baseman Jesus Aguilar.
Mark Reynolds singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Tony Wolters grounds into a double play, second baseman Jonathan Villar to shortstop Orlando Arcia to first baseman Jesus Aguilar. Mark Reynolds out at 2nd.
Tyler Anderson flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Charlie Blackmon singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Keon Broxton.
DJ LeMahieu singles on a soft line drive to pitcher Zach Davies, deflected by second baseman Jonathan Villar. Charlie Blackmon to 2nd.
Carlos Gonzalez lines out to third baseman Travis Shaw.
Nolan Arenado doubles (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun, deflected by third baseman Travis Shaw. Charlie Blackmon scores. DJ LeMahieu to 3rd.
Trevor Story walks.

Gerardo Parra doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Keon Broxton. DJ LeMahieu scores. Nolan Arenado scores. Trevor Story scores. Gerardo Parra out at 3rd, center fielder Keon Broxton to second baseman Jonathan Villar to third baseman Travis Shaw.
Mark Reynolds walks.
Tony Wolters grounds into a force out, second baseman Jonathan Villar to shortstop Orlando Arcia. Mark Reynolds out at 2nd.

Defensive switch from third base to first base for Travis Shaw.
Pitching Change: Jhan Marinez replaces Zach Davies, batting 6th.
Defensive Substitution: Hernan Perez replaces pitcher Zach Davies, batting 9th, playing third base.
Mark Reynolds doubles (2) on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun. Trevor Story scores. Gerardo Parra to 3rd.
